name: Titan - Hand Dyed Thick & Thin Merino Wool Yarn - Colorway: Harbor
description:
Soft shades of smokey aqua hand-dyed onto my "Titan" base yarn. A super soft, squishy, thick and thin 100% merino wool. Next to the skin soft. Artsy, hand-spun look. Perfect for chunky cowls, scarfs, hats, etc. All yarn is hand-dyed in small batches in my smoke-free studio.

100g (3.5 oz)
Approx. 110 yds
Bulky Weight
Gauge: 2 - 2.5 stitches/inch on U.S. #11-13 needles
Handwash in cool water. Lay flat to dry.

Need more skeins than the quantity listed as available? Just let me know. Most colors can be reproduced within 5-7 days. 

As with all hand dyed yarn, expect subtle color variations between skeins. It is always best to alternate skeins on projects calling for more than one skein of yarn. Dyes are colorfast and should not run or fade. 

Every effort has been made to represent yarn colors as accurately as possible. Please note, however, that every computer monitor varies slightly in the way that they display colors. 

All orders are thoughtfully packaged (suitable for gift giving) in tissue paper and tied with lovely charcoal gray and white twine.

I am happy to wind your yarn into a center pull ball at no charge. Just leave me a note in the "Note to Seller" option at checkout.
